title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Service-oriented builders guide to agentic AI: Insights from WEX (ARC313)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向服务的构建者代理AI指南：来自WEX的洞察 (ARC313)
abstract: Large language models and agentic tools have reached enterprise viability, with Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) principles providing the foundation for robust agentic systems. This session examines which SOA design principles translate directly to generative AI implementations and which require rethinking for agent orchestration and nondeterministic behaviors. Learn architectural patterns for secure AI service integration, tools for enterprise-scale agent deployment, and techniques for building agents that work seamlessly with existing ecosystems. WEX demonstrates how extending SOA into the agentic domain enables generative AI solutions to deliver enterprise-grade operational support at scale. Gain practical insights into combining SOA best practices with modern AI architecture requirements.
abstract_cn: 大型语言模型和智能体工具已达到企业可行性，面向服务架构（SOA）原则为构建稳健的智能体系统提供了基础。本次会议探讨哪些SOA设计原则可直接应用于生成式AI实现，哪些需要针对智能体编排和非确定性行为进行重新思考。学习安全AI服务集成的架构模式、企业级智能体部署工具，以及构建与现有生态系统无缝协作的智能体的技术。WEX演示如何将SOA扩展到智能体领域，使生成式AI解决方案能够大规模提供企业级运营支持。获得将SOA最佳实践与现代AI架构要求相结合的实用见解。
